title: negative LP: intended or bug?
body:
I recently dodged a ranked game at 0 lp and ended up having -3lp. This was not just a visual bug as you can see in the picture.
I don't really care about those 3 lp, i just wanted to know if this is intended or not.

replies.body: Intended. It's penalty for queue dodging.
The penalty for a dodge in ranked is a loss of 3 LP, which still applies even if you're at 0 LP already. Dodging is the only way to wind up at negative LP.
ah ok, like i said i don't really care about 3 lp because -3lp < another loose at 0 lp. Dodging makes you life a lot easier.
Yeah. It's designed to be more of a deterrent for frequently abusing dodges, rather than a major penalty for a single dodge.
It jumps to -10 lp if you dodge a second time within a certain amount of time (where you get the 30 minute time penalty), so dodge sparingly.
It is completely intended,that also often happens when you (i think) enter a fresh division,and so to not get demoted,you instead get negative LP
no you stay at 0 lp if u lose at new divison
_To dodge or to lose, that is the difference._
